description:
This course is designed to teach you how to make a flared skirt, even if you have little to no experience with it,

to make clothes yourself that help you to be come designer. You can learn all things about making skirt.

Our course is contains drawing pattern and making clothes, hand sewing skills. After this class, you will be alble to make other designed skirt.

What are the requirements?
•No previous clothes making skills required


What am I going to get from this course?
•Over 19 lectures and 140 mins of content!
•Learn from drawing pattern, cut out a pattern, overlook, sew zipper, clean bottom edge, making belt, place hook
•Learn everything about skirt

What is the target audience?
•Students who wants to study how to make skirt
•Major in fashion design students
•People interested in sewing
title: How to make a flared skirt yourself!
